Reviews.Title: Great but.
Reviews.Author: Kevin S
Reviews.Content: Well if you are looking for a wide angle lens this is not for you. 6.0 mm lens is the reading for this one. Seems to have a Zoomed in look. But Great pic in color and night vision. Wide angle lens are measured at least in the 3 mm number range. Good Luck.

Reviews.Title: came in on time
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: everything i askd for and more . looking forword to working with them agagin . I would recomend to myfriends.

ProductInfo.Features:
36 IR illuminators for night vision. 6.0mm Lens. Connection Type: RCA audio & RCA video & 2.1 mm center positive power plugs
Built-in light sensor controls IR activation. Metal body housing, mount and sun shade
Affordable day night CMOS security camera. Aluminum casing. 520TVL high resolution
NTSC signal system. 0 lux with IR LEDs on. Build-in audio microphone and built-in mechanical IR-Cut filter switch
Power supply: 12V DC 500mA or above (sold separately ), 1 bonus warning Decal 3"x2"
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Audio Video Outdoor Infrared Bullet Security Camera 520TVL Day Night Vision with IR-Cut Filter Switch for CCTV Home Surveillance DVR System with Bonus Security Warning Decal IR809AS C1X
